data.name: HeroHeadline
data.value: Your private photo album — fast, secure, and instantly shareable

data.name: HeroSubhead
data.value: Create a personalized space in seconds: upload photos, organize albums, share with a QR code and order professional prints anytime

data.name: EmailHelp
data.value: We'll send you an access code to this email

data.name: AcceptTerms
data.value: I accept the terms and conditions

data.name: AccessQRDescription
data.value: Use your device's camera to scan your space's QR code

data.name: QRScan_Instructions
data.value: Point the camera at a QR code

data.name: Privacy_Intro
data.value: This privacy policy explains how PrintBucket collects, uses and discloses information when you use the Web UI and API.

data.name: Privacy_DataCollected_Usage
data.value: Usage data such as IP address, timestamps, request logs and performance metrics necessary to operate the service.

data.name: Privacy_DataCollected_FileUploads
data.value: Files you upload (images), associated metadata (file names, bucket IDs) and optional descriptions you provide.

data.name: Privacy_DataCollected_Diagnostics
data.value: Optional diagnostic and error reports (stack traces, logs) if you enable them to help us improve the product.

data.name: Privacy_HowWeUse
data.value: We use data to provide, operate and improve the service, to process uploads, to respond to support requests and to detect abuse.

data.name: Privacy_ThirdParties
data.value: We use AWS services (S3, DynamoDB) and may use external analytics or monitoring providers. Their privacy policies apply to data they process.

data.name: Privacy_Retention
data.value: Uploaded files and metadata are retained while your bucket exists or as required by law. You can request deletion; removal may take time to propagate.

data.name: Privacy_Security
data.value: We apply standard security measures (TLS in transit, AWS access controls). The protection of stored objects depends on bucket policies and correct configuration.

data.name: Privacy_YourRights
data.value: You may request access, correction or deletion of personal data. Contact support and provide identification to exercise these rights.

data.name: Privacy_Children
data.value: The service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children.

data.name: Privacy_Changes
data.value: We may update this policy. We will post changes here with a revised effective date.

data.name: AccessCode_Length
data.value: Access code must be between {2} and {1} characters

data.name: AccessCode_Invalid
data.value: Invalid access code. Please check and try again.

data.name: AccessCode_Error
data.value: An error occurred while validating the access code. Please try again later.

data.name: CreateBucket_Error
data.value: An error occurred while creating your bucket. Please try again later.
